about_the_game:
A Tiny Space Adventure: A Galactic Journey of Sibling Bond

Are you ready for the big adventure? Welcome to the galactic journey of A Tiny Space Adventure, spanning across 6 exciting episodes!

WITH THE DEMO VERSION:

  • Play the ENTIRE first episode completely FREE

  • Discover an immersive story that starts in Greenfield Town and extends into the depths of space

  • Solve creative puzzles and enjoy mini-games

  • And most importantly - witness the beginning of this grand adventure!

We're confident you'll be saying "I want more!" by the end of the first episode. Five more episodes await you with new planets, puzzles, and thrilling adventures!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.10 veya üzeri
  • Processor: Intel veya Apple Silicon (M1/M2) işlemciler
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 destekli herhangi bir ekran kartı
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: **A Tiny Space Adventure** follows a brother and his dog, Jupiter, on an exciting journey through space to rescue his sister. With fun puzzles, quirky characters, and unique aliens, this adventure offers a delightful experience for players of all ages.
